title: Enterprise Cloud Platform
description: Architected and delivered a scalable Azure-based platform serving 10M+ users with 99.99% uptime. Implemented DevSecOps pipelines reducing deployment time by 70% and enhanced security posture through automated compliance checks and zero-trust networking.

title: AI-Powered Analytics System
description: Designed a high-performance AI analytics platform processing 100TB+ daily, reducing query latency by 85% through distributed architecture and intelligent caching. Enabled real-time decision-making for enterprise clients with sub-second response times.

title: Secure Microservices Architecture
description: Led migration of monolithic system to microservices on Azure Kubernetes, improving scalability and reducing infrastructure costs by 40%. Implemented comprehensive security controls and observability, achieving SOC 2 compliance.
